content: penis dishcloth free pattern by jacob stevne jørgensen @krejacob stevne when publishing your work please indicate the designer of the pattern you are not allowed to sell the pattern materials crochet hook 3 5 mm e ~35 g of 8/8 cotton yarn e g mayflower 8/8 or drops paris skills needed chain stitch single_crochet single_crochet popcorn explanation below how to make the popcorn all of the following is worked into a single stich *yarn over insert hook pull up a loop yarn over pull through two loops* repeat *-* for a total of 4 times resulting in five loops on the hook yarn over and pull through all five loops how to read the diagram you begin in the lower right corner white boxes mean single crochets blue boxes mean popcorn stitches pattern chain 30 make a single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook this is the square with the start arrow and single_crochet in the following 28 stitches turn with a chain crochet back and forth making popcorn stitches whenever the diagram shows a blue square that s it enjoy diagram is created using https //flosscross com/ start
